name: nvmcl
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4
body: |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(co(c1, c4, c3), c2))

body.origin: |- wi(w3a(wf(c4, cxp(c2, c2), c2), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(co(c1, c4, c3), c2))

comment: Closure law for the vector subtraction operation of a normed complex vector space. (Contributed by NM, 11-Sep-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
